message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to find something within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
I'm still a bit hesitant to go as low as $110, Bob. However, I'm willing to compromise further. I'll offer it to you for $115. It's a great price, and I think you'll be happy with the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your asking price.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $112. It's my final offer, so I hope you can meet me halfway.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair price. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product. I hope this aligns better with both our expectations.

I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already given you a great deal, and I think $112 is a fair price. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm going to have to consider other options. I'm willing to sell the product to John for $120, and I think he would be a good buyer. I'm giving you one last chance to meet me at $112. If not, I'll have to move on.
